text:
The notice requirements of this 
Chapter 79A shall apply to any City Project that is within the scope of 
Chapter 79. The exemptions of Section 
79.3 and the requirements applicable to a change in the project set forth in Section 
79.4 shall apply.
(Added by Ord. 43-12, File No. 111079, App. 3/13/12, Eff. 4/12/12)
